text: Great little bar with nice atmosphere.  I love the wood on the ceiling and walls.  I was pleasantly surprised to see that they had Lake Louie on tap.  The location in Black Earth is a bit of a haul for me, though, so I'll have to look forward to the occasional visit when I'm passing through town.
Phenomenal prime rib which comes with garlic mashed potatoes and scallops. Absolutely amazing!
Classic Wisconsin tavern: good beer selection, charming interior, clean restrooms. Food was very tasty; handmade, fresh burger patties!! Volleyball court out back, give this one a try!
